entry: [not visited]Greetings, adventurer. Welcome to this ancient and mysterious land.
[not visited]I am your designated magical gender fairy and will guide you on your quest. I bet you have a lot of questions !set visited
>[not toggledgender]What gender related magic can you cast? @magic
>[not visited]I got no time for this...
rejected: >Sorry, I actually do need some guidance @entry
nicetomeet: Ho ho ho, what a friendly fella you are. The last one wasn't of the talkative kind. !set option_nicetomeet
But you and I will get along just fine.
chosenone: It wasn't a pretty sight. Lot's of misunderstandings, some disrespectful verbal exchanges.
Long story short, you won't see him anytime soon. Trust me.
Subtelty is not my strong suit
>I can see that. Back to topic!
whatsgoingon: Oh you now, the usual. Some unresolved cataclysmic quarrels between some fire elementals.
You'll find one of them just around the corner to the east
dangerous: Not as dangerous as it sounds. How dangerous can a sentient fire be...
likefire: Please don't touch the fire... We cannot deal with another lawsuit. Not to speak of the smell...
Took a while to get the stench of this level
What a great comedian you are!
spider: [not isracist]What, don't you see the fairy wings on my back? My golden hair and cute make up?
[not isracist]I worked really hard to earn all of these traits.
>[not isracist]Since when are spiders allowed to be fairies? @racist
fairyschool: Of course not. Only the best of the best can become fairies
I went through six years of fairy university and another two years of unpaid internships as fairy assistant
Can't wait until I get my new pink fairy dress. The one I got at graduation didn't fit.
>I cannot guess why... Back to topic @entry
racist: I will ignore your racist remark in good faith... you racist! !set isracist !set askedaboutspider
magic: [not askedformoregenders]I'm not your run of the mill gender fairy.
[not askedformoregenders]With my bachelor degree in gender studies, I know everything about genders
[not askedformoregenders]I can instantly tell that you've been born to be at least one of two genders!
[askedformoregenders] Like I said, you have a gender!
Ho ho ho, that's not all! I have the power to accidentally change the gender of humans against their will
Abra cadabra and it is done!
You are very welcome, gender swapped human!
moregenders: There's only so much you can do with this kind of pixel resolution...
Also, don't question my bachelor knowledge!
swapgender: Why? Don't you like your current gender?
